name: Team Up VR (Beta)
description: Immerse yourself in the world of ultimate war between Terminators and Humans. Choose your hero from different playable characters. Fight and claim your victory in an epic VR death match.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980, AMD R9 390 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
